content: half granny square shawl by cleo malone yarn gauge 500 yards of fingering weight yarn 5 5 sts and 3 row per inch in double_crochet after blocking hook us g / 4 mm measurements 48 across & 22 tall notions 1 locking stitch marker pattern notes 1 chain 4 double_crochet 3 chain 1 double_crochet 4 into 4th chain from hook repeat instructions in brackets in the 2 chain 3 turn double_crochet 3 into first st chain 1 double_crochet directed place and/or the number of 3 chain 1 double_crochet 3 into chain 1 space pm in last times indicated chain 1 space made chain 1 double_crochet 4 into beg chain of last row for this pattern you may follow the 3 chain 3 turn double_crochet 3 in first st chain 1 double_crochet written instructions or use the chart on 3 chain 1 into each chain 1 space to m rm the next page the last chart row is double_crochet 3 chain 1 double_crochet 3 into next chain 1 space repeated with an additional group of 3 pm in last chain 1 space made chain 1 double_crochet 3 double crochets added on each side into each chain 1 space to end chain 1 double_crochet 4 until shawl is desired size into beg chain of last row 4 repeat step 3 until shawl measures 22 down the center 48 across or desired size 5 fasten_off & weave in ends 6 block to measurements abbreviations beg / beginning chain / chain double_crochet / double_crochet pm / place marker rm / remove marker space / space st s / stitch es
